events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The issue has been categorized under refund requests based on customer mention of refund and return.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah W. who specializes in refunds and returns.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused, and I still have the original packaging as well.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate your refund and send you a prepaid return shipping label within 24 hours.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and the help with returning the jacket.
Your refund case is now resolved. Please use the return label once received, and the refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and to see if thereâ€™s anything else we can assist you with.
Since the return label has been sent and refund initiated, this case will now be closed. Thank you for contacting support.
